```{r try-questoes}
has.questoes <-
  !evaluate::is.error(try(match(list.dirs(getwd()), "Questões"),
                silent = TRUE)
  )
```

```{r simuladores, eval = has.questoes}
questoes <- readxl::read_excel("simuladores.xlsx",
               sheet = 1,
               col_types = c("text"))

for (i in 1:dim(questoes)[1]) {
  cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
  cat(paste0('# **', questoes[i,1], '**'))
  cat('\n\n<!-- -->\n\n')
  
  cat(
    paste(
      '<iframe src=\"',
      questoes[i,2],
      '\" style=\"width:100%; height:400px; border:2px solid black;"></iframe>',
      sep = ""
    )
  )
}
```
